StewardIntro: The steward is at your service! The only problem is that all of the mattresses have been sent off to be treated for the nasty bedbug infestation we've had going on here, so there is nothing to sleep on.
StewardMattress: If you come across a mattress in your adventures, don't hesitate to bring it back here.
StewardPlace: Oh, Lord! Where on Earth did you dig that up!? ^ It's better than nothing, but it's going to be impossible to sleep on it without an air freshener!
StewardTip: If I were you, I'd stock up on air fresheners.
